member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML
member.summary: This class establishes a rich XHTML log file. Then, lines can be added in three flavors ( error, nonerror, and complete).
member.remarks:
There are two modes that can be used for this log file. You can specify and , which will leave the file stream (and associated resources) open during the period between the two calls. Alternatively, you can just call the Write routines directly. It will open the stream before the write and close right after writing and modifying the header information.
Object created by Mark V Sullivan (2003) for University of Florida's Digital Library Center.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor which builds a new LogFileXHTML object
member.param: File Name and Path for this LogFileXHTML object
member.example: To see examples, look at the examples listed under the main class.
member.remarks:
This uses the following default values:
Title - this is set to no title by default
Application Name - this is left blank by default
Row Header - Disabled ( can be enabled by calling the method )
Date Stamping - Enabled ( can be changed by calling the property )
Exceptions - Enabled ( can be changed by calling the property )
member.exception: A will be thrown here if the directory for the log file does not exist, and can not be created.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML.AddNonError(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a non-error line to the current log file.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, otherwise FALSE
member.remarks:
This uses the default style defined as 'logEntry' with the following attributes:
Color: Black
Font-Size: 15
Bold: false
Italics: false
member.example: To see examples, look at the examples listed under the main class.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML.AddError(System.String)
member.summary: Adds an error line to the current log file.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, otherwise FALSE
member.remarks:
This uses the default style defined as 'errorLogEntry' with the following attributes:
Color: Red
Font-Size: 15
Bold: true
Italics: false
member.example: To see examples, look at the examples listed under the main class.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML.AddComplete(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a line indicating completeness to the log file.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, otherwise FALSE
member.remarks:
This uses the default style defined as 'completedLogEntry' with the following attributes:
Color: Blue
Font-Size: 15
Bold: true
Italics: false
member.example: To see examples, look at the examples listed under the main class.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML.AddNewStyle(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
[NOT YET FULLY IMPLEMENTED]
Create a new style for this log file.
member.remarks:
This style will be used in the Style Definition section and will be used in the body of the text below. Any custom styles will need to be specified when the line is added to the log file. When a style is added to the XHTML Log file, a new object is created and added to a collection of style objects.
The following colors are accepted:
Aqua
Lime
Black
Blue
Fuchsia
Green
Gray
Maroon
Navy
Olive
Purple
Red
Silver
Teal
Yellow
member.param: Color for text of this style
Flag tells whether text of this style should be emboldened
member.returns: TRUE if this style was successfully added, otherwise FALSE
member.example: To see examples, look at the examples listed under the main class.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.Settings.IS_UserSettings
member.summary: IS_UserSettings is an abstract, static class which uses Isolated Storage and XML to store and retrive the settings for an application's user.
member.remarks: Object created by Mark V Sullivan (2004) for University of Florida's Digital Library Center.

member.summary: Holds the DataSet which has all of the settings for this user

member.summary: Reads the user settings from a XML file in Isolated Storage

member.remarks: If the XML file does not exist, an empty DataSet is created

member.summary: Reads the user settings from a XML file in Isolated Storage

member.example: For examples, see the example under the class.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo
member.remarks:
This class allows for the following actions:
Encrypting and Decrypting strings. [ and ]
Reading and Writing to encrypted files. [ and ]
Getting the current username. [ ]
Getting username and security level information from a security database.
Object created by Mark V Sullivan (2003) for University of Florida's Digital Library Center.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the SecurityInfo object.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.LocalMachineKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string value from the registry under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.
member.param: Name of the value to retrieve
member.returns: String value from the registry, or "-1" if an error occurs

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.CurrentUserKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string value from the registry under HKEY_CURRENT_USER.
member.param: Name of the value to retrieve
member.returns: String value from the registry, or "-1" if an error occurs

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.ReadFromEncryptedFile(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads text from a file encrypted in DES encryption. (128 bit symmetric encryption)
member.param: Path and name of file to be read from
Character position to start reading from
Number of characters to read from the file
member.returns: Character array of data read and decrypted from file or a NULL if there was an error

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.WriteToEncryptedFile(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes text to a file encrypted in DES encryption. (128 bit symmetric encryption)
member.param: Text which will be written to the file
Path and name of file to be written to
Character position in file to write the text
member.returns: TRUE if written successfully, otherwise FALSE

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.SHA1_EncryptString(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt a string, given the string.
member.returns: The encrypted string

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.DES_EncryptString(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt a string, given the string.
member.returns: The encrypted string

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.EncryptString(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt a string, given the string, the key, and the IV values.
member.returns: The encrypted string

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.DecryptString(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt a string, given the string, the key, and the IV values.
member.returns: The decrypted string

member.name: P:SobekCM.Tools.SecurityInfo.UserName
member.summary: Gets the complete current users name as a string.
member.remarks: This name is returned in the form 'DOMAIN\username'.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type
member.summary: Enumeration indicates the type of FDA Ingest Report

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type.INGEST
member.summary: FDA Ingest Report when a SIP is successfully ingested into the digital archive

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type.WITHDRAWAL
member.summary: Report is created when an item is withdrawn from the digital archive

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type.DISSEMINATION
member.summary: Dissemination Report is written when an item is re-ingested into the archive

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type.ERROR
member.summary: FDA Ingest Error Report when a SIP is not ingested into the digital archive

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Type.INVALID
member.summary: Used to indicate an unrecognized FDA report type

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Writer
member.summary: Class is used to write the FDA Report data in various formats

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Writer.Write_Text(SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Data,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the basic information about a FDA report as a text file
member.param: Name for the text output file
member.returns: Flag indicating if the report creation was successful

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Writer.Write(SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Data,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the basic information about a FDA ingest report as a valid XML file
member.param: Name for the XML output file
member.returns: Flag indicating if the report creation was successful

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Reader
member.summary: Class is used to read the XML report from FDA
member.remarks:
This uses an XML reader to iterate through each node in a FDA report and build the associated object.
This does not save any GLOBAL files or any files not included in the package from the DEPOSITOR. When saving the individual file information in each package, this greatly ballooned the size of each FDA report data.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Reader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the FDA report and creates the associated data object
member.param: Name (including path) of the report to read
member.returns: All the important data from an ingest report
member.remarks: If an exception occurred during this process, the last exception is accessible in the property.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Tools.FDA.FDA_Report_Reader.Last_Exception
member.summary: Get the last exception which occurred

member.name: T:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style
member.summary:
[ NOT YET FULLY IMPLEMENTED ]
LogFileXHTML_Style is a class used to hold information about a specific style used in the class.
member.remarks:
This class is created by calls to the method in the class.
Object created by Mark V Sullivan (2003) for University of Florida's Digital Library Center.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.bold
member.summary: Private bool variable stores flag which indicates if this style should have the actual log portion of the line emboldened.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.font_Color
member.summary: Private string variable stores the information for the color of the font used for this style.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.font_Family
member.summary: Private string variable stores the information for the font family for this style.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.font_Size
member.summary: Private string variable stores the information for the size of the font to use for this style.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.italics
member.summary: Private bool variable stores flag which indicates if the actual log information for these style should be italicized.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.name
member.summary: Private string variable stores the name of this style to be referenced in the body of the XHTML document.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFileXHTML_Style.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for the LogFileXHTML_Style class.
member.param: Flag which indicates if this style should have the actual log portion of the line emboldened.
The information for the color of the font used for this style.
The information for the size of the font to use for this style.
Flag which indicates if the actual log information for these style should be italicized.
The name of this style to be referenced in the body of the XHTML document.

members.member:
LogFile_Exception is a custom exception which is thrown for any error caught while creating, or writing to a log file.
This class extends the class. >

member.name: M:SobekCM.Tools.Logs.LogFile_Exception.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor which creates a new LogFile_Exception
member.param: Custom message which explains the error which occurred to fire this exception.
